helpItems:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Get-SCPFile Get SCPFile
Download a File from a SSH Server using SCP
Download a specified file from a SSH Server using SCP given its full path and name to give it locally.
Get-SCPFile ComputerName
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SCP Session.
String[] String[]
None
Credential
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
PSCredential PSCredential
None
Port
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SCP connection
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyServer
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
String String
None
ProxyPort
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyCredential
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required
PSCredential PSCredential
None
ProxyType
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
String String
None
LocalFile
Full path and file name to where to download the file on the local system.
String String
None
RemoteFile
Full path to file on server that you wish to download.
String String
None
OperationTimeout
@{Text=}
Int32 Int32
None
ConnectionTimeout
@{Text=}
Int32 Int32
None
AcceptKey
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
SwitchParameter
False
Force
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
SwitchParameter
False
ErrorOnUntrusted
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
SwitchParameter
False
NoProgress
Dont show a progress bar during download of the file.
SwitchParameter
False
KeyFile
OpenSSH format SSH private key file.
String String
None
ComputerName
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SCP Session.
String[] String[]
None
Credential
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
PSCredential PSCredential
None

SSH TCP Port number to use for the SCP connection

None

None
ProxyPort
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyCredential
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required
PSCredential PSCredential
None
ProxyType
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
String String
None
LocalFile
Full path and file name to where to download the file on the local system.
String String
None
RemoteFile
Full path to file on server that you wish to download.
String String
None

@{Text=}

Get-SFTPFile Get SFTPFile
Download a filefrom a SSH Server using SFTP.
Download a folder from a SSH server using SFTP against a current session.
Get-SFTPFile SessionId
Session Id number of an exiting SFTP Session.
Int32[] Int32[]
None
LocalPath
Folder on the local machine where to download the file to.
String String
None
RemoteFile
Full path on of file to download on the remote host.
String String
None
Overwrite
If file is already present locally overwrite it.
SwitchParameter
False
NoProgress
@{Text=}
SwitchParameter
False
Get-SFTPFile SFTPSession
SFTP Session Object of a currently connected session.
SftpSession[] SftpSession[]
None
LocalPath
Folder on the local machine where to download the file to.
String String
None
RemoteFile
Full path on of file to download on the remote host.
String String
None
Overwrite
If file is already present locally overwrite it.
SwitchParameter
False
NoProgress
@{Text=}
SwitchParameter
False
SessionId
Session Id number of an exiting SFTP Session.
Int32[] Int32[]
None
RemoteFile
Full path on of file to download on the remote host.
String String
None
LocalPath
Folder on the local machine where to download the file to.
String String
None
Overwrite
If file is already present locally overwrite it.
SwitchParameter SwitchParameter
False
SFTPSession
SFTP Session Object of a currently connected session.
SftpSession[] SftpSession[]
None
NoProgress

SwitchParameter SwitchParameter
False

System.String

Online Version: http://sshnet.codeplex.com/
New-SFTPSession New SFTPSession
Creates an SSH Session against a SSH Server
Creates an SFTP Session against a remote server. The command supports creating connection thru a Proxy and allows for authentication to the server using username and password. If a key file is specified the command will use the password in the credentials parameter as the paraphrase of the key.
New-SFTPSession ComputerName
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SFTP Session.
String[] String[]
None
Credential
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key passphrase.
PSCredential PSCredential
None
Port
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SFTP connection.
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyServer
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
String String
None
ProxyPort
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyCredential
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required.
PSCredential PSCredential
None
ProxyType
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
String String
None
OperationTimeout
@{Text=}
Int32 Int32
None
ConnectionTimeout
@{Text=}
Int32 Int32
None
KeepAliveInterval
Keep Alive interval in seconds for a connection.
Int32 Int32
None
AcceptKey
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
SwitchParameter
False
Force
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
SwitchParameter
False
ErrorOnUntrusted
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
SwitchParameter
False
KeyFile
OpenSSH format SSH private key file.
String[] String[]
None
ComputerName
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SFTP Session.
String[] String[]
None
Credential
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key passphrase.
PSCredential PSCredential
None
Port
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SFTP connection.
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyServer
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
String String
None
ProxyPort
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
Int32 Int32
None
ProxyCredential
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required.
PSCredential PSCredential
None
ProxyType
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
String String
None
OperationTimeout
@{Text=}
Int32 Int32
None
ConnectionTimeout
@{Text=}
Int32 Int32
None
KeepAliveInterval
Keep Alive interval in seconds for a connection.
Int32 Int32
None
AcceptKey
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
SwitchParameter SwitchParameter
False

Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
SwitchParameter SwitchParameter
False

Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
SwitchParameter SwitchParameter

-------------- Example 1 -------------- PS C:\> New-SFTPSession -ComputerName 192.168.1.155 -Credential (Get-Credential) -Verbose
Create a new SFTP Session to a remote hosts using credentials.
Online Version: http://sshnet.codeplex.com/

maml:description.maml:para: Download a File from a SSH Server using SCP
Download a specified file from a SSH Server using SCP given its full path and name to give it locally.
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SCP Session.
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SCP connection
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
Full path and file name to where to download the file on the local system.
Full path to file on server that you wish to download.
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
Dont show a progress bar during download of the file.
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SCP Session.
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SCP connection
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
OpenSSH format SSH private key file.
Full path and file name to where to download the file on the local system.
Full path to file on server that you wish to download.
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
Dont show a progress bar during download of the file.
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SCP Session.
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
OpenSSH key in a string array to be used for authentication.
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SCP connection
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.

Full path and file name to where to download the file on the local system.
Full path to file on server that you wish to download.
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
Dont show a progress bar during download of the file.

Download a folder from a SSH Server using SCP.
Download a specified folder from a SSH Server using SCP.
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SCP Session.
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SCP connection.
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required.
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
Full path and folder name to where to download the folder on the local system.
Full path to folder on server that you wish to download
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
Dont show a progress bar during download of the file.

Creates an SSH Session against a SSH Server

Creates an SFTP Session against a remote server. The command supports creating connection thru a Proxy and allows for authentication to the server using username and password. If a key file is specified the command will use the password in the credentials parameter as the paraphrase of the key.
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SFTP Session.
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key passphrase.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Create a new SFTP Session to a remote hosts using credentials.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates an SSH Session against a SSH Server

Creates an SSH Session against a remote server. The command supports creating connection thru a Proxy and allows for authentication to the server using username and password. If a key file is specified the command will use the password in the credentials parameter as the paraphrase of the key.
FQDN or IP Address of host to establish a SSH Session.
SSH Credentials to use for connecting to a server. If a key file is used the password field is used for the Key pass phrase.
SSH TCP Port number to use for the SSH connection.
Proxy server name or IP Address to use for connection.
Port to connect to on proxy server to route connection.
PowerShell Credential Object with the credentials for use to connect to proxy server if required.
Type of Proxy being used (HTTP, Socks4 or Socks5).
Keep Alive interval in seconds for a connection.
Automatically accepts a new SSH fingerprint for a host
Do not perform any host key validation of the host.
Throw a terminating error if the host key is not a trusted one.
